FinServ_Card__c.name: FinServ_Card__c
FinServ_Card__c.description: Represents credit or debit card associated with this financial account.

AccountHolder__c.description: Individual credit or debit holder associated with this card.

Active__c.description: Indicates whether the account is active (true) or inactive (false). Default is true.

BinNumber__c.description: Bank Identification number for this account.

FinancialAccount__c.description: Financial account associated with this card.

OwnershipType__c.description: Type of ownership for this card. Valid values: Primary Authorized Other

SourceSystemId__c.description: ID that uniquely identifies the financial account in an external data source.

ValidUntil__c.description: Date card is no longer valid.
